alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fruitland, or near Pomona Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Satsuma, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
